Title: OpenSunTracker - Windows Client (OSTWin)
Description: The idea behind the OpenSunTracker is to build the base for a do-it-sourself-project for simple (one-axis) sun-tracking system and this is a simple client
HomeWiki:
The idea behind the OpenSunTracker is to build the base for a do-it-sourself-project for simple (one-axis) sun-tracking system with the calculated sun position, a minimal set of hardware and a broadband support for frame dimensions and gears, further stuff can be found @ http://www.opensuntracker.info.

...and this is a simple windows (WPF) Client-Application
